value:
$WmMPID_比翼ソティス,ch17_05_Sothis_FM_Pair,Face|Hmm... Ah! Over there! I sense candy
in that direction. Quickly, now—time
is wasting!$k$p$nMPID_ベレト|You want...candy?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_Halloween21,Face|What do you worms want? I've just
about had enough of this whole
festival charade...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ソティス,ch17_05_Sothis_FM_Pair,Face|Now, now... Where is your festival
spirit? Perhaps you'd prefer tricks
to treats?$k$pDo as you wish, but I must not relent
in my sweet pursuit—on my name as
progenitor god!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ベレト,ch17_05_Sothis_FM_Pair,Face|Sothis, we should pull back. It's clear
he will not be defeated so easily.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_Halloween21,Face|You insects aren't worth the effort
it would take to clean my boot after
stamping you out. I'm leaving.$k$p$Sbs150|
